channel.title: Posts on Reineke Fuchs
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Reineke Fuchs

item.title: Metrofuchs
item.author: derReineke@protonmail.com (Reineke Fuchs)
item.description: This page I made as a part of my original portfolio; it is a hidden page. I really like the Brutalist web design aesthetic, so I wanted to make one of my own. I also wanted to demonstrate my German. metrofuchs

item.title: Retrofuchs
item.author: derReineke@protonmail.com (Reineke Fuchs)
item.description: This was my first portfolio page. It is modelled to look like a Unix terminal. It is not the best, but I still really like it. retrofuchs

item.title: Truslav
item.author: derReineke@protonmail.com (Reineke Fuchs)
item.description: The actual, hosted truslav site can be found here: https://truslav.com Here is the site that I made for the first version of truslav.com: truslav.com
